    Improving Your Home IP Camera/ CCTV to Wide Angle View

    A DIY guide to upgrading your home IP camera or CCTV with a wide-angle lens for better coverage.

    less than 1 minute read

    1. Home
      2. /
    2. Home security
      3. /

      4. /
    4. Improving Your Home IP Camera/ CCTV to Wide Angle View

    Matthew Choo

    With 20 years in market research across Telco and Media, I’ve decoded consumer behavior, optimized research, and driven data-led strategies. Now, I’m diving into coding, automation, and tech solutions—where data meets efficiency. This blog is my space to share insights, from Python scripts to research optimizations and life hacks. Join me in exploring smarter ways to work and live!

    • Asia
    • Email

    You only need 3 things:

    1. Wide Angle Lens for smartphones
    2. Super Glue
    3. Your IP Camera/ CCTV with small lens hole

    What you will get = 160 degree view IP Camera (Normally IP cameras are 60 degree view only)

    Tags: CCTV, DIY, Home Security, IP Camera, Wide Angle

    Categories: DIY, Home Security
